comment:
* Stores the window information about a particular Activity.
 * It contains the info that is not part of {@link android.content.res.Configuration}.
 * @hide

methods.name: public void set(boolean isEmbedded, @NonNull Rect taskBounds, @NonNull Rect taskFragmentBounds)
public boolean isEmbedded()
methods.comment:
* Whether this activity is embedded, which means it is a TaskFragment that doesn't fill the
     * leaf Task.

methods.name: public Rect getTaskBounds()
methods.comment: * The bounds of the leaf Task window in display space.

methods.name: public Rect getTaskFragmentBounds()
methods.comment:
* The bounds of the leaf TaskFragment window in display space.
     * This can be referring to the bounds of the same window as {@link #getTaskBounds()} when
     * the activity is not embedded.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void set(boolean isEmbedded, @NonNull Rect taskBounds, @NonNull Rect taskFragmentBounds)
public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
